name: Ion Cubes
description:
Ion Cubes is a very simple game, in fact my first game going to be uploaded! I may update the game, but it could just be a fun game to just try out and get a cool high score. The game may also be used to test unity3d settings for other unity games you may want to try if you have a slow computer.
Controls :
A : Left
D : Right
Mouse Drag : Third Person Camera
Left Mouse : Restart
